description: This file defines the TicTacToeAI class, which implements the logic for an AI player in a Tic Tac Toe game. It provides methods to choose the optimal move based on the current board state, including strategies to win, block the opponent, or take strategic positions.

classes.name: TicTacToeAI
classes.description: A class implementing the AI logic for making moves in Tic Tac Toe, including strategies to win or block the opponent.

methods.name: chooseMove
methods.description: Decides the best move index for the AI based on current board, aiMark, and humanMark.

methods.name: _findWinningMove
methods.description: Checks for a move that would allow the given mark to win immediately.
